House Passes Comstock Legislation Combating Sexual Harassment #VA10
https://comstock.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/house-passes-comstock-legislation-combating-sexual-harassment …pic.twitter.com/gLEryT1paX

ICYMI: I was on with Harris Faulkner yesterday to talk about our bipartisan resolution on sexual harassment that will be voted on later today. More needs to be done but this is a first but important step. #VA10 http://video.foxnews.com/v/5661303066001/?#sp=show-clips …pic.twitter.com/CMm4Q5GDk1

“I do think this is a watershed moment...What happened in Hollywood, what happened in media, in other industries sort of broke it all open that it didn’t matter where you came down politically, that a predator is a predator.” https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/virginia-politics/comstock-stands-up-for-victims-of-sexual-harassment-i-can-be-their-voice/2017/11/28/c4c64cb4-d45b-11e7-a986-d0a9770d9a3e_story.html?hpid=hp_local-news_comstock-7pm%3Ahomepage%2Fstory&utm_term=.e9d28e350524 … #VA10

Met with staff at FEMA’s Disaster Operations Center today in Winchester to thank these dedicated federal workers for all of their hard work in helping Americans in Texas, Florida, Puerto Rico, and the U.S. Virgin Islands after the devastating hurricanes from this past summer.pic.twitter.com/onQ89VfIyk

Visited the @ShenandoahU Veteran, Military, & Family Resource Center today with SU President, Tracy Fitzsimmons and student veterans. President Fitzsimmons started the center to provide emotional and social support of veterans, active military members, and their families. #VA10pic.twitter.com/DO2ioLWwGG

You can watch my full interview on @ThisWeekABC with @RepSpeier, @DonnaFEdwards, and @ZainabSalbi where we discussed sexual harassment in Congress and the bipartisan Resolution that we will be voting on this week. http://abcnews.go.com/video/embed?id=51388866 … #VA10pic.twitter.com/rpJixkFeX1

Tune in at 9am on Ch. 7 where I will be joining @MarthaRaddatz @RepSpeier @DonnaFEdwards on @ThisWeekABC to talk about sexual harassment in Congress and our Resolution that will be voted on in the House this week. #VA10https://twitter.com/ThisWeekABC/status/934772751109324800 …

House to Consider Comstock Resolution Mandating Anti-Harassment, Anti-Discrimination Training Requirements. https://comstock.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/house-consider-comstock-resolution-mandating-anti-harassment-anti … #VA10pic.twitter.com/V6C86VAJ2R

As Military Family Appreciation Month comes to a close, we take time to give thanks for our military families who have to spend holidays apart while their loved ones risk their lives in service to our nation. It's never easy to spend a holiday away from those closest to you.#VA10pic.twitter.com/1WTKHRjpWJ

As we look to coming together and celebrating Thanksgiving, my husband Chip and I give thanks for our loved ones and those close to us and for the many blessings we have in our family. We wish you a #HappyThanksgiving and as we all gather around the table and give thanks. #VA10pic.twitter.com/bli3BA4Ttm
ICYMI: I joined @DanaPerino on @FoxNews yesterday to discuss sexual harassment legislation on Capitol Hill. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2kgXPW9if0c&feature=youtu.be … #VA10

Today we visited @SousVideCuisine, a food products company that employs approximately 800 people in Loudoun and continues to grow. Cuisine Solutions specializes in the sous-vide cooking technique and supplies companies like Starbucks, Panera as well as the U.S. Military. #VA10pic.twitter.com/dJpaHeGhzf

Congrats to Emerick Elementary School in Purcellville for being named a National Blue Ribbon School by the U.S. Department of Education.  Principal Dawn Haddock, Assistant Principal David Cramer and their team of teachers and staff have fostered a center of excellence of learningpic.twitter.com/69i0V2dHGn

Today is the National Day of Adoption. Earlier this year, we honored Colleen and Richard Davis from Winchester as the 10th District’s “Angels in Adoption” for their incredible generosity and contributions on behalf of children in need of families.  #VA10pic.twitter.com/hZZiZdMM7H

Last night I had the pleasure of joining Supervisor Ron Meyer and other leaders in our community in attending the grand opening of the Waltonwood senior care center in Ashburn to celebrate this new home for seniors in our community.  #VA10pic.twitter.com/8e7Og7mTnK

On this day in 1800, Congress held the 1st session in the incomplete Capitol Building with both chambers in session. If you would like to visit the recently refurbished Capitol and learn more during a personal tour, you can contact my office here: https://comstock.house.gov/tours-and-tickets … #VA10pic.twitter.com/ZdjOyjrSpR

Today is #WorldPancreaticCancerDay and we wear purple to raise awareness for the 3rd leading cause of cancer-related death in the nation. You can read more information on pancreatic cancer here: https://www.cancer.org/cancer/pancreatic-cancer.html … #VA10pic.twitter.com/212S4T1R9k

After working for weeks with my colleagues, and listening to my constituents about ways to improve the #TaxCutsAndJobsAct , I supported moving the bill forward today as the next step to bringing tax cuts to hardworking taxpayers and businesses and creating a healthy economy #VA10pic.twitter.com/94HX0pDQsl

Today, the Science, Space, and Technology Committee unanimously approved four bills relating to STEM education, which included a bill I introduced, H.R. 4375, the STEM Research and Education Effectiveness and Transparency Act... #VA10pic.twitter.com/h19PH5LYHC

Today the House passed, with my support, the Conference report to H.R. 2810, the National Defense Authorization Act for FY18, important legislation that provides $699.9 billion for a stronger military...#VA10pic.twitter.com/NQ9htvWIb7

"There is a new recognition of this problem and the need for change of culture that looks the other way because of who the offenders are...it's time to say no more." http://abcnews.go.com/Politics/congresswoman-warns-sexual-harassment-capitol-hill/story?id=51141859 … #VA10pic.twitter.com/cd2dVO5s8F

Joined Pastor Michelle C. Thomas, Ron Campbell Leesburg Town Council, Del. Randy Minchew and other local leaders from Loudoun to honor the more than forty lives of enslaved people at the Belmont Slave Cemetery earlier today. #VA10pic.twitter.com/pJslqBjPxr

Happy Veterans Day to all those served. This past week the House of Representatives passed by bipartisan votes a series of 14 bills to help veterans on a number of issues. Including a bill I cosponsored, H.R. 1133, the Veterans Transplant Coverage Act of 2017. #VA10pic.twitter.com/CPNDxgMwlJ

Stopped by a Veterans Day Red Cross blood drive sponsored by the @SUHornets Baseball team today. Thank you to @GoresMeats for cooking up hamburgers for our veterans and those who participated in the blood drive. #VA10pic.twitter.com/4SnsTxCGmk

Joined star, turnaround specialist Principal Joanie Hovatter @gqeswps today for "Take Your Legislator to School" Day with Del. Chris Collins. This school, which is one of the 15% highest performing, high poverty schools in the Commonwealth has a challenging STEM curriculum #VA10pic.twitter.com/20YvAvFifz

This morning Millbrook High School honored area Shenandoah Valley veterans like World War II veteran and ex prisoner of war Carmel Whetzel and his wife Carol. Carmel is still going strong at 94 years and it was wonderful to visit with him.  #VA10pic.twitter.com/0LpxWlo8zt

Happy birthday to our Marines who have served our country for 242 honorable years.  Today we honor the sacrifices they have made in service to our nation.  Thank you to those who have served to ensure the freedom of their fellow Americans. Semper Fidelis! #VA10pic.twitter.com/X6f3YpOGql

Tonight I participated in a Human Trafficking Awareness forum sponsored by the Great Falls Rotary @AirlineAmbIntl @madeiraschool @justaskprevent  and Blue Heart Campaign. #VA10pic.twitter.com/aXIUwF0jNc
Great to meet with Government students from Sherando High School in Stephens City today after they toured the U.S. Capitol.  #VA10pic.twitter.com/kDNJqW8zqv

Welcomed the Flutonic Harmonics from Purcellville today to the U.S. Capitol. Under the leadership of Michelle Rubis, the Flutonic Harmonics experienced tremendous success over the last year and were a part of the Universal STARS Performance Program in Orlando, Florida. #VA10pic.twitter.com/TROn7Oqtjx
I am sickened by the evil and violence in Sutherland Springs, Texas earlier today. Our Prayers are with the victims and their families and our gratitude to our law enforcement and first responders.

Joined Epsilon Zeta Boule Foundation, @VOAChesapeake, Mobile Hope of Loudoun, @CADCA and Stone Bridge High School for their 6th Annual “Salute For Service”, Loudoun County 5K Race for the Homeless. #VA10pic.twitter.com/HoZEekJOTt

WJLA: Aguilar-Cruz is described by PW Police as a Hispanic female standing 5' 2" tall and weighing 125 pounds, brown hair. Authorities are asking anyone with information on Aguilar-Cruz to call Prince William County Police at 703-792-6500 http://wjla.com/news/local/police-va-girl-found-after-being-likely-taken-by-alleged-ms-13-gang-member-missing-again … #VA10

Joined Bull Run Rotary Club for the launch of Flags for Heroes located on the grounds of the @CityofManassas Museum last night. This display will last through 11/12 and honors veterans and stand-out citizens of the community. We honored Navy Nurse Veteran Marie Komyathy #VA10pic.twitter.com/iRDNscSXKQ

Today I voted in support of H.R. 3922 – the CHAMPIONING HEALTHY KIDS Act. Which provides a 5-year extension to the CHIP program that children and low-income families rely on. This bill also includes a needed two-year extension of funding for Community Health Centers. #VA10pic.twitter.com/sUiQwBQjkD
I joined Amazon yesterday morning in Herndon as their veteran apprenticeship program starts in NOVA.  http://wjla.com/news/local/amazon-expands-apprenticeship-program-for-veterans-in-dc-area … #VA10

The Leesburg Access Center will provide certified counseling services for our Veterans, active duty military, and their families with mental health needs, and I am excited to see this much-needed facility come to Loudoun County. https://comstock.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/us-department-veterans-affairs-vet-center-community-access-center-coming … #VA10
Today I voted for H.R. 849, the Protecting Seniors' Access to Medicare Act, a bipartisan bill to repeal the Independent Payment Advisory Board (IPAB), which I also cosponsored.  #VA10

Jay Lanham, ED of NOVA Regional Gang Task Force: "On behalf of the NOVA Police Chiefs and Loudoun County Sheriff, I would like to extend our thanks and gratitude for Rep. Comstock's support and ongoing efforts to return much needed funding to the NOVA Regional Gang Force." #VA10

Chuck Canterbury, Pres. of @GLFOP “By rejuvenating the program and getting the “worst of the worst” off our streets, including helping rid our communities of the transnational street gang MS-13, we believe our nation as a whole will be safer.” #VA10https://comstock.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/house-judiciary-committee-approves-rep-comstock-bill-help-local-law …

House Judiciary Committee Approves Rep. Comstock Bill to Help Local Law Enforcement Combat Gang Violence. This bill will help steer federal funding toward frontline regional gang task forces like the Northern Virginia Regional Gang Task Force https://comstock.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/house-judiciary-committee-approves-rep-comstock-bill-help-local-law … #VA10

Joined a bipartisan group of my colleagues in the House to speak w/ Thae Yong-ho, the highest ranking North Korean official who has defected in many years. We appreciated the unique perspective he shared w/ us on North Korea, having an inside view of the dictatorial regime. #VA10pic.twitter.com/U9niiiQvDr

Our profound thanks to our brave law enforcement in NYC for stopping today’s terrorist attack and our condolences and prayers are with the victims and families. We stand with our law enforcement professionals and the people of NYC. https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/post-nation/wp/2017/10/31/nypd-says-one-person-in-custody-after-reported-incident-in-manhattan/?hpid=hp_hp-banner-high_nyc-4pm%3Ahomepage%2Fstory&utm_term=.2e1320071596 … #VA10

Joined a bipartisan group of women members, along with supportive men, to recognize #BreastCancerAwarenessMonth. Breast cancer is the most commonly diagnosed cancer for women and awareness of and early detection is critical to ensuring that the best treatments can begin early.pic.twitter.com/gmviF4b9hb

Chip and I joined our friends and neighbors in support of the Great Falls Rotary for their 2nd annual Oktoberfest fundraiser to benefit the charitable activities that they support in our community. We met with computer forensic technicians @DHSgov Security Investigations Computer Forensics Unit yesterday where they support law enforcement for the entire national capital region. The officers piece together disabled electronics to help solve violent crimes. #VA10pic.twitter.com/YZ47CphroK

Today is National Prescription Drug Take Back Day, according to a 2015 survey "a majority of abused prescription drugs were obtained..often from the home medicine cabinet.” To find a #VA10 location where you can dispose of your prescription drugs go here: https://takebackday.dea.gov/ pic.twitter.com/rjtHCiuFVQ

Congressman Frank Wolf will be testifying at noon today before a House Foreign Affairs Subcommittee. Rep. Wolf will report on a fact finding mission he took to Iraq and how the world can stop genocide by ISIS against religious and ethnic minorities Watch:https://foreignaffairs.house.gov/hearing/subcommittee-hearing-iraq-syria-genocide-emergency-relief-accountability/ …

I am heartbroken by the mass murder that took place last night in Las Vegas and I am praying for the victims, families, and first responders. The heroic actions taken by the SWAT team and many off duty police, no doubt saved many lives. To locate loved ones call 1-866-535-5654.
